name: Trial Dirt Bike Racing:Mayhem
description:
Trial Dirt Stunt Bike Racing is the best offroad moto riding game with insane and stunt action!

Trial xtreme: world's #1 side-scrolling trial bike racer game available on iTunes. Prove yourself

as the best extreme rider among your friends and then make your way to the top of the world

ranking charts! Launch off an enormous jump, land on your rear wheel and crash your way through a

variety of well designed levels.
Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion. Bike

Mayhem Racing: Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps,

scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes.
Earn cash in races. The unparalleled physics engine gives you a level of control that you won’t

believe what you’re playing in the palm of your hand!

This is no ordinary skill base riding game – our brand new Xtreme physics engine and super

responsive controls will help you burn through crazy obstacles and take you for a ride like you

wouldn't believe!

Game Features:
- Epic bike crashes, fun rag doll physics and active bike suspension
- Eye popping high definition graphics
- Tricks, bunny hops and flips!
- Crazy addictive game-play with ultra smooth tilt controls
- Realistic bike physics and working bike shocks for cool stunts
- Unlock over 30 challenging levels
- Play with ghost to challenge yourself
- Change the appearance of your bike and rider
- Moto Racing: Stickman trials
- Addictive gameplay
- Playable for any device including tablets
- Several amazing well designed tracks and more free tracks coming soon
- Enjoy Christmas holidays by playing this awesome game :)

How to play:
- Simply tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate / brake
- Touch right side to accelerate
- Touch left side to brake
- Tilt your cell phone to balance the biker
